page.title: 09Holiday Makers
page.content: In our area there are lots of{small {private hotels}and{guest houses. We thought we would do a survey to find out about{accommodation}used by holiday makers, the length of their holiday, where they lived and why so many of them chose Jersey for their holidays. We prepared a questionnaire which we used to record the answers of fifty holiday makers. We found that most visitors were staying in small hotels. The average length of holiday was one to two weeks. Most visitors were from the Midlands and the south of England. They had chosen to come to Jersey for their holidays because they thought that Jersey had a lot of attractions such as better weather than England, good beaches, plenty of nightlife. Everyone we spoke to said that they were enjoying their holidays.
